images.copyright: A pod of narwhals near Baffin Island, Nunavut, Canada (© Eric Baccega/Minden Pictures)
images.title: Unicorns of the sea
images.caption: Unicorns of the sea
images.desc: It’s Unicorn Day! To honour the mythical horned beast, we bring you the next best thing: a pod of narwhals in the Arctic Ocean. Narwhals develop only two teeth, but the left canine can grow into a 9ft-long spiral tusk. As it juts out of the top of their head, it's earned them the nickname, 'unicorn of the sea'.

og.title: Unicorns of the sea
og.desc: It’s Unicorn Day! To honour the mythical horned beast, we bring you the next best thing: a pod of narwhals in the Arctic Ocean. Narwhals…
